translation.en: ♪ I say you can't bеcause I lost it When I knew you were alive ♪ ♪ I'll go anywhere you wanna go ♪
translation.fr: BEN HOPE J'AI HÂTE DE TE VOIR, BISOU
BEN HOPE ON SE VOIT À LA PAUSE PLUTÔT ?

translation.en: Uh, don't forget there'll now be students from all school years
translation.fr: N'oubliez pas que nous avons mélangé les classes.

translation.en: in your new form groups. I hope you enjoy getting to know
translation.fr: J'espère que serez heureux de rencontrer… CLASSE MÉLANGÉE B25

translation.en: some fresh faces in registration each day.
translation.fr: … de nouvelles têtes à l'appel chaque jour.

translation.en: Oh! If it isn't Charlie Spring. Happy New Year.
translation.fr: Tiens, tiens, Charlie Spring. Bonne année.

translation.en: Where did I put you on the seating plan?

translation.fr: Ah oui, tu es là, à côté

translation.en: He's in Year 11, so only one year older than you.
translation.fr: Il est en seconde, un an de plus que toi.

translation.en: One of the rugby boys too, I think. I'm sure you'll get along swimmingly.
translation.fr: Il fait du rugby. Vous vous entendrez à merveille.

translation.en: Or you can just sit in silence for the rest of the year.
translation.fr: Ou vous ne vous adresserez pas la parole.

translation.en: It really doesn't affect me in any way whatsoever.
translation.fr: Pour ma part, ça m'est égal.
- Pardon pour ce matin. - Pas grave.

translation.en: I missed your face so much.
Really? Did you have a good Christmas?
translation.fr: C'est vrai ? Tu as passé un bon Noël ?

translation.en: Yeah, it was all right. You?
Yeah. Yeah, it was good. Um…
My whole family was around on Christmas day and then…
translation.fr: Toute ma famille était là et…

translation.en: - Still don't tell anyone about this. - Oh. Um…
- Are you going that way? - Yeah. Maths.
translation.fr: - Tu vas par là ? - Oui. En maths.

translation.en: Are you literally doing your homework while walking to your lesson?
translation.fr: Tu fais tes devoirs en allant au cours ?

translation.en: That makes me sound way cooler than I actually am.
translation.fr: Ça fait mec cool, mais en fait non.

translation.en: Do you want me to do that for you?
- No, I'm good. - I can tell you the answer.
translation.fr: - Non, ça va. - Je connais la réponse.

translation.en: If you're stuck I can just… Let me just…
Why are you talking to me? I don't know who you are.
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu me parles ? Je sais pas qui t'es.

translation.en: Uh, yeah. He's in my year.
translation.fr: Ouais. Il est en seconde aussi.
J'en ai pris un pour Elle.

translation.en: - Didn't you do that yesterday? - Yes, Isaac. Yes, I did.
translation.fr: - Tu as déjà fait ça hier. - Oui, Isaac.

translation.en: - She's not been here all week. - I know. I keep forgetting.
translation.fr: - Ça fait une semaine. - Je sais. Mais j'oublie.

translation.en: Tao, you're allowed to miss her.
translation.fr: Tao, elle te manque, c'est normal.

translation.en: It's better that she's at an all- girls school.
translation.fr: Elle est mieux dans un lycée pour filles.

translation.en: Mr. Reed was still refusing to call her Elle.
translation.fr: M. Reed refusait toujours de l'appeler Elle.

translation.en: Yeah. Mr. Reed's a massive transphobe.
There used to be four of us, now there's only three.
translation.fr: On était quatre, on se retrouve à trois.
À trois, c'est juste un… trio.

translation.en: The guy you sit next to in form?
translation.fr: C'est pas ton voisin de classe ?

translation.en: - Who? - He looks like a golden retriever.
He doesn't look like a golden retriever.
I can't believe you've been sat next to rugby king Nick Nelson.
translation.fr: J'hallucine que tu sois assis à côté du roi du rugby.

translation.en: What are you going to talk about?
Charlie, you don't have a tissue, do you?
translation.fr: T'aurais pas un mouchoir, par hasard ?

translation.en: - It's not coming off. - You're gonna be blue forever.
translation.fr: - Ça part pas. - Tu vas rester bleu à vie.

translation.en: Looks like I'm wearing blue gloves!
You can make it the new school fashion.
Or I'll pretend it's a tattoo.
translation.fr: Ou dire que c'est un tatouage.

translation.en: - What? Why? - Why? Look at them.
We are a group. No, a trio of borderline outcasts.
translation.fr: On forme un groupe… Non, un trio de marginaux.

translation.en: He is the star player on the rugby team,
translation.fr: Et lui, c'est la star du rugby,

translation.en: and he's friends with a bunch of loud, gross Year 11s
translation.fr: il est pote avec les gros bourrins dégueu de seconde

translation.en: who are like the guys who bullied you last year.
I bet he's a whole different person when he's with his bro dude friends.
translation.fr: Je parie qu'il change du tout au tout quand il est avec ces grosses brutes.

translation.en: Lunch ends in five minutes, girls.
translation.fr: Cinq minutes, les filles. LYCÉE POUR FILLES HIGGS

translation.en: We don't make exceptions, even for new students.
translation.fr: Pas d'exception, même pour les nouvelles.

translation.en: You can have this back from reception at the end of the day.
translation.fr: Tu le récupéreras ce soir à l'accueil.

translation.en: You know I'm sorry about ignoring you yesterday.
It's quite a while since you've hidden in here at lunch.
translation.fr: Tu n'étais pas venu te cacher ici depuis longtemps.

translation.en: No bullies I need to sort out again?
Actually, there is kind of someone.
translation.fr: Enfin, si, il y a quelqu'un.

translation.en: - Okay… - I don't even know if…
translation.fr: - D'accord. - Je sais même pas si…

translation.en: I don't think he even thinks we're boyfriends anyway.
translation.fr: Mais pour lui, je crois pas qu'on est ensemble.

translation.en: He doesn't even like people seeing us talk to each other in the corridors.
translation.fr: Même parler dans le couloir, ça le gêne.

translation.en: He pretends like he doesn't know who I am.
translation.fr: Il fait semblant de pas me connaître.

translation.en: But then when it's just us two he's fine.
translation.fr: Mais quand on est tous les deux, ça va.

translation.en: Well, have you talked to him about how that makes you feel?
translation.fr: Tu lui as dit que ça te dérangeait ?

translation.en: Maybe you should talk to him then?
What do you want me to say? Break up with him?
translation.fr: Tu veux que je te dise de le plaquer ?

translation.en: - I don't know. - Well, do you want to break up with him?
translation.fr: Je sais pas. Tu as envie de le plaquer ?

translation.en: I can't solve your problems for you, Charlie.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas régler ça à ta place.

translation.en: What about your friends, have you talked to them about it?
translation.fr: Tu en as parlé à tes amis ?

translation.en: - They wouldn't get it. - Why not?
It's better to be honest about your feelings in the long run.
translation.fr: Il vaut toujours mieux être sincère.

translation.en: I know. It took you three months to tell me you were being bullied.
translation.fr: Je sais. Tu as mis trois mois à me dire qu'on te martyrisait.

translation.en: - I'd never lie to you, don't worry. - Okay.
- We will. If you're nice. - Never mind then.
I broke up with my boyfriend.
Hypothetically, what sort of boy do you want to go out with?
translation.fr: Tu voudrais sortir avec quel genre de garçon ?

translation.en: One who doesn't mind people seeing us talk to each other would be nice.
translation.fr: Déjà, un qui serait pas gêné qu'on nous voie ensemble.

translation.en: or do you want an opposites attract thing?
I don't think I can afford to be that specific, to be honest.
translation.fr: Je peux pas faire le difficile.
Dans l'idéal. Le mec de tes rêves.

translation.en: Just someone I can have a laugh with.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un avec qui je me marre.

translation.en: I'd probably just settle for someone tall.
We've been doing this all term and no one's beaten Charlie's time yet.
translation.fr: Vous courez depuis des mois, Charlie est toujours devant.

translation.en: Charlie's leaving you all in the dust!
translation.fr: Charlie vous met une longueur d'avance !

translation.en: So, um, I had something I wanted to ask you.
translation.fr: Je voulais te demander un truc.

translation.en: Charlie… I wanted to tell you that I'm gay too.
translation.fr: Charlie, je voulais te dire que je suis gay aussi.

translation.en: And I'm in love with you.
Do you want to go out with me?
I want to be with you forever.
Do you want to join the rugby team?
We have enough players for the team
but we're not allowed to actually play against other teams without a reserve.
translation.fr: mais on n'a pas le droit de jouer sans remplaçant.

translation.en: And I saw you run in PE and you're, like, really fast.
translation.fr: Je t'ai vu en EPS, tu cours super vite.

translation.en: So… I thought you might be interested.
translation.fr: Je me suis dit que ça pourrait t'intéresser.

translation.en: I don't really know how to play.
That's fine. I can teach you.
Aren't I a bit small and weak to be a rugby player?
translation.fr: Je suis pas trop petit et faible pour jouer au rugby ?

translation.en: We're just a school team, you know. It's not that serious.
translation.fr: C'est juste l'équipe du bahut. C'est pas du sérieux.

translation.en: So you're saying I am small and weak?
translation.fr: Mais je suis petit et faible ?

translation.en: So, do you want to join?
It's literally just another silly crush.
translation.fr: Encore un coup de cœur débile.

translation.en: It's not a crush. I don't just fall for any guy who's nice to me.
translation.fr: Non. Je craque pas sur tous les mecs gentils avec moi.

translation.en: And you're sure you want to spend a whole hour
translation.fr: Tu es sûr de vouloir passer une heure

translation.en: - with giant, moronic, rugby lads? - Yes.
- Isn't he in Year 8? - No. Year 10.
translation.fr: - Il est pas en 5e ? - Non, en 3e.

translation.en: I'm sure he's a nice guy but we actually want to be dece.
I know I was joking about being weak, but I'm definitely too weak for this.
translation.fr: En fait, c'est pas une blague, je suis trop faible pour ça !

translation.en: Where is your can do attitude?
Just try. Tackle me, I won't dodge.
Come on, I bet you can do it.
translation.fr: Je parie que tu peux le faire.

translation.en: Now, let's try again while I'm actually moving.
Yeah, you got it. One more time, come on.
One, two, three, squeeze! One, two, three, squeeze!
Come on, mate. We've got practice.
- I'm trying to score a try. - Yeah.
translation.fr: Je tente de marquer un essai.

translation.en: And you try and run up to me.
You're wearing a coat? It's not even cold.
translation.fr: En manteau ? Il fait même pas froid.

translation.en: God, what's your problem? I'm trying to be nice.
I said I don't want to meet up anymore.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit que c'était fini.

translation.en: - Yeah, and I don't believe you. - What?
You're clearly just scared of getting caught.
translation.fr: T'as juste peur qu'on se fasse choper.

translation.en: Why would I be scared of getting caught?
Everyone in school already knows I'm gay.
translation.fr: Tout le bahut sait que je suis gay.

translation.en: You're the one who's scared of getting caught.
You can't even look at me when other people are around.
translation.fr: T'es même pas fichu de me regarder en public.

translation.en: Not to mention the fact that you have a girlfriend.
translation.fr: En plus, tu as une copine.

translation.en: Yeah. I've seen you with her at the school gate.
translation.fr: Je vous ai vus devant le portail.
Ah non, tu me l'as pas dit.

translation.en: Don't be angry at me for not wanting to come out yet.
translation.fr: Tu m'en veux de pas être ouvertement gay.

translation.en: If you're figuring stuff out, fine. Take your time.
translation.fr: Si tu te cherches encore, prends ton temps.

translation.en: I would have been there for you.
Don't you think I, of all people, would understand you're figuring out your sexuality?
translation.fr: Tu crois que j'aurais pas compris ? Moi ?

translation.en: Then why are you angry at me?
I'm angry because you never even slightly cared about my feelings.
translation.fr: Parce que tu t'es jamais soucié de ce que je ressentais.

translation.en: We only ever meet up when you want to.
translation.fr: On se voit que quand tu veux.

translation.en: Where you want to. When you feel like kissing a boy.
translation.fr: Où tu veux. Quand t'as envie d'embrasser un garçon.

translation.en: You don't care about me at all.
It's not like anyone else is going to want to go out with you, is it?
translation.fr: Réfléchis bien, personne d'autre voudra de toi.

translation.en: - I know you like me. - Stop it!
translation.fr: - Je sais que je te plais. - Arrête !

translation.en: Charlie, I like you but I'm figuring stuff out.
translation.fr: Tu me plais aussi, mais je me cherche.

translation.en: What more do you want from me?
Did you hear all of that?
You seemed kind of like something was up while we were getting changed, so I…
translation.fr: Tu avais l'air bizarre quand on s'est changés, alors je…

translation.en: I wanted to check everything was okay.
translation.fr: Je venais m'assurer que ça allait.

translation.en: You have nothing to be sorry about.
- I kind of want to say it. - Don't.
We'll get locked in if we stay here much longer.
translation.fr: Ou on va se faire enfermer.
